attributes.description:
1st Installment  November 2022
Here are some of what the team at Renault Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
Toyota's latest diminutive car, the Agya, landed on our shores in 2020, and has proven to be a great addition to Toyota's extensive line-up. The Agya is a compact vehicle, that's a joy to navigate through traffic, and parking is done with ease. At approximately 835Kgs, the Agya's 1.0L engine is more than willing, and by virtue, returns a fantastic fuel consumption. The Agya has also been equipped with ABS, EBD and dual airbags for that added peace of mind in terms of safety. 

Balance of Toyota's 3 year / 100'000Km warranty, and a 2 year / 20'000Km service plan, which can be extended. 

Don't miss out. Call us now, or leave your details and we will be sure to call you.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs. E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority!

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

attributes.description:
2004 Audi A8 4.2 V8 Quattro in Atlas Grey Metallic with Light Beige Interior.

This very well equipped Audi A8 comes with full service history and a list of extraâ€™s that are almost to long to mention all of them.

Outside you have Alloy Rims, Front and Rear Fog lights, Keyless entry, Sunroof with Solar Panel. The Solar Panel allows for you to utilize the Air-Conditioning while the vehicle is switched off.

Inside you are greeted to absolute opulence, With Light Wood Inlays and full leather seats with memory functions. You have a central display screen that you can hide or reveal at the touch of a button. This Display has options for a full navigation system, car information, radio status, and suspension settings. You will note that with the keyless entry, you have keyless start, with finger print recognition. The Finger print recognition allows for four individual memory settings for your unique driving position, mirror position, radio station settings as well as climate settings.

Speaking of suspension, you get adaptive dampening settings as well as vehicle height control.

This vehicle is a cash only purchase

Trade Ins most welcomed

Nationwide Delivery Possible.
